00029 // set to ATAP value of XBee. AP=2 is recommended
00030 #define ATAP 2
00031 
00032 #define START_BYTE 0x7e
00033 #define ESCAPE 0x7d
00034 #define XON 0x11
00035 #define XOFF 0x13
00036 
00037 #define MAX_PACKET_SIZE 100
00038 
00039 #define BROADCAST_ADDRESS 0xffff
00040 #define ZB_BROADCAST_ADDRESS 0xfffe
00041 
00042 // the constant size of the api frame (not including frame id or api id or variable data size for packets that support payload)
00043 #define ZB_TX_API_LENGTH 12
00044 #define TX_16_API_LENGTH 3
00045 #define TX_64_API_LENGTH 9
00046 // start/length(2)/api/frameid/checksum bytes
00047 #define PACKET_OVERHEAD_LENGTH 6
00048 // api is always the third byte in packet
00049 #define API_ID_INDEX 3
00050 
00051 // frame position of rssi byte
00052 #define RX_16_RSSI_OFFSET 2
00053 #define RX_64_RSSI_OFFSET 8
00054 
00055 #define DEFAULT_FRAME_ID 1
00056 #define NO_RESPONSE_FRAME_ID 0
00057 
00058 // TODO put in tx16 class
00059 #define ACK_OPTION 0
00060 #define DISABLE_ACK_OPTION 1
00061 #define BROADCAST_OPTION 4
00062 
00063 // RX options
00064 #define ZB_PACKET_ACKNOWLEDGED 0x01
00065 #define ZB_BROADCAST_PACKET 0x02

00387 class XBeeRequest {
00388 public:
00393         XBeeRequest(uint8_t apiId, uint8_t frameId, uint16_t frameDataLength, uint8_t* _payloadPtr, uint8_t _payloadLength);
00397         void assemblePacket();
00401         uint8_t getFrameDataLength();
00405         uint8_t* getPacket();
00410         void setPacket(uint8_t* frameDataPtr);
00414         uint8_t* getPayload();
00418         uint8_t getPayloadLength();
00422         void setFrameId(uint8_t frameId);
00426         uint8_t getFrameId();
00427 protected:
00428         uint8_t computeChecksum(uint8_t* arr, int len, int offset);
00429         // setting = 0 makes this a pure virtual function, meaning the subclass must implement, like abstract in java
00430         virtual void assembleFrame() = 0;
00431 private:
00432         // NOTE: length of data stored in the array; does not include apiId and frameId, so add two for true frame data length
00433         uint8_t _apiId;
00434         uint8_t _frameId;
00435         uint8_t _packetLength;
00436         uint8_t* _packetPtr;
00437         uint16_t _frameDataLength;
00438         uint8_t* _payloadPtr;
00439         uint8_t _payloadLength;
00440 };
